column5: I was just wondering if anyone fished at smiths mill pond? I talked to a fellow fisherman that said it was a good place to try but i can't find any info in the regs for that body of water?   So thanks for any info.

If there's nothing specific in the regs then the general rules apply for limits etc. specific bodies of water are only mentioned if there are exceptions. Access is a different matter.  I haven't fished there but perhaps head down there for a look and chat to anyone fishing? Have rod in the car if it looks good.
have no clue where this is, but by responding I save you from the oblivion of "page 2" and get you back to the top of one...for now. Hopefully someone else can help
Just punched "smiths mill pond"ontario into Google and got a map, apparently it's south of Brantford. Link
